name: Wing-mans Halloween
description:
Be the best wingman you can be! Keep the party vibe going and give these people a good time!!!

Nothing brings people closer together than food! Keep your guests happy by feeding them! If they are sad then bring them over a special friend ;) but be careful of sending the wrong message to them, they could get into you!

Move as fast as you can to keep the vibe of the party going, but watch your proximity to people! don't bump into them, they don't like that and you don't want to spill your food or drinks...

CONTROLS

-WASD to move
-Right Click pickup right hand
-Left Click pickup left hand
-F interact
-Bubbles are the wants of the people
-Talk to sad lonely people they need your help wing man
